Fall has been detected. Are you okay?

This app has been developed at the University of Glasgow Computing Science department in a student project. We have developed this app to study how it is used. For this purpose, we will collect data from the app and upload it to our servers for analysis. The data we collect includes: your device id; what screens you visit in the app; what times you use the app; what device you use; and information about your connectivity. The data will not be shared with anyone except other researchers. As far as possible, your participation in the study will be kept confidential and the data will be made anonymous. The outcomes and findings of this research will be made freely available in the form of academic publications and presentations.

By installing and using this app you are participating in our research. If you are under 16 years of age, or you do not agree to participate, please stop using this app. You can contact us at any time if you would like further information, to opt out, or for us to delete data:
By agreeing to the terms and conditions of this application you agree that:
• You understand that the app has been developed at the University of Glasgow for research purposes.
• You have had the opportunity to read the information above.
• You understand that you are free to withdraw from the study at any time, without giving any reason, and without your legal rights being affected.
• You agree to take part in our research.
